sentences.en: a modern construction
sentences.cn: 一幢现代建筑

sentences.en: a road construction project
sentences.cn: 道路修建计划

sentences.en: An economic boom followed, especially in housing and construction.
sentences.cn: 接着出现了经济繁荣，尤其是在房地产业和建筑业。

sentences.en: Check the actual construction of the chair by looking underneath.
sentences.cn: 看看椅子的下面，检查一下它的实际构造。

sentences.en: Construction work fell behind schedule.
sentences.cn: 建筑进度落后于工期。

sentences.en: construction workers
sentences.cn: 建筑工人

sentences.en: difficult grammatical constructions
sentences.cn: 艰深的语法结构

sentences.en: External doors should be of robust construction.
sentences.cn: 外门应该结构坚固。

sentences.en: He is held in high esteem by colleagues in the construction industry.
sentences.cn: 建筑业的同行们都非常敬重他。

sentences.en: He put the wrong construction on what he saw.
sentences.cn: 他误解了所见到的事情。

sentences.en: Many Bangladeshis were employed in the construction or fishing industries.
sentences.cn: 许多孟加拉国人都从事建筑业或渔业。

sentences.en: The chairs were light in construction yet extremely strong.
sentences.cn: 这些椅子构造轻巧，但却极为结实。

sentences.en: The construction industry is no longer as depressed as it was.
sentences.cn: 建筑业不再像以往那样萧条了。

sentences.en: The construction industry was clobbered by recession.
sentences.cn: 建筑业受到经济衰退的严重影响。

sentences.en: The demand generated by one factory required the construction of another.
sentences.cn: 一家工厂产生的需求使得必须再建造一家工厂。

sentences.en: The denial was limited to rejecting the construction put on his remarks.
sentences.cn: 这种否认仅限于不接受对他所说话语的阐释。

sentences.en: The houses were partly timber in construction.
sentences.cn: 这些房子有些部分是木结构的。

sentences.en: The industry is coeval with the construction of the first railways.
sentences.cn: 这一产业和初期铁路的建造相伴而生。

sentences.en: The Locomotive Construction Company Ltd is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Trust.
sentences.cn: 机车建筑有限公司是该托拉斯的全资子公司。

sentences.en: They had to battle through thick mud to reach construction workers.
sentences.cn: 他们只好挣扎着穿过厚厚的泥巴去找建筑工人。

sentences.en: Work has begun on the construction of the new airport.
sentences.cn: 新机场的修建已经开工。

words.tran_cn: 建设性的；推定的；构造上的；有助益的
构造函数；构造器；建造者

phrases.tran_cn: 建筑工程管理，施工管理
建筑计划，建设项目；基建计划
施工技术，建筑技术；建筑施工；建筑工艺学
基础设施；基础设施建设
在建造中；正在施工之中

trans.tran_cn: 建造（方式），施工，建筑（物），结构，创立，解释
trans.tran_en: the process of building things such as houses, bridges, roads etc
